definition: to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: He unclasped his briefcase and took out his notes.
sentences.chinese: 他打开公文包拿出记事本。

sentences.english: Keep a notepad at your bedside along with a gentle night-light and pen.
sentences.chinese: 床边放一个小记事本，一盏柔和的夜明灯和一支笔。

sentences.english: You can use Notepad for the Chinese resource properties file.
sentences.chinese: 您可以使用记事本来编辑中文资源属性文件。

sentences.english: Thirty minutes earlier, I triple-checked the address scrawled in my notebook.
sentences.chinese: 三十分钟前，我再三确认记事本上草草写就的地址。

sentences.english: When you close Notepad, the console application will close as well.
sentences.chinese: 当你关闭记事本时，该控制台应用程序也将关闭。

sentences.english: Get a pen and a notepad.
You can use a simple notebook, some white paper or a diary.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用记事本，日记本或者几张白纸来记录。

sentences.english: and the Multi-Toll NotePad, text-editing software.
sentences.chinese: 还有一个多行的记事本，是一个文本编辑软件。

sentences.english: My favorite, by far, is AK Notepad.
sentences.chinese: 我目前最喜欢的就是AK记事本。

sentences.english: Cut out the blank areas of used paper and staple together to make notepads .
sentences.chinese: 把使用过的纸张钉在一起做成记事本。

sentences.english: Open the file in a Notepad window.
sentences.chinese: 在记事本窗口中打开该文件。

sentences.english: I was buying a typewriter rebind and he was looking for faxes.
sentences.chinese: 当时我在那儿买打印机带子，他在看备忘记事本。

sentences.english: Bring a notepad of something with you.
sentences.chinese: 随手带着一个类似记事本的玩意儿。

sentences.english: I sat down and grabbed my pencil and notebook. Holmes went on.
sentences.chinese: 我重新坐下，掏出铅笔和记事本。福尔摩斯接着说

definition: book/notebook/Japanese-style self-published comic (esp. an erotic one), aka "dōjinshi"/CL:本[ben3]/edition
to take down (in writing)/notes/a type of literature consisting mainly of short sketches/CL:本[ben3]
